alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Pulaski; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 9:19AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Dodge, southeastern Pulaski and western Wilcox Counties through 945 AM EDT... At 919 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Pope City, or 12 miles west of Abbeville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Eastman, Abbeville, Rochelle, Pineview, Pitts, Union, Cedar Creek, Pope City, Ocmulgee Banks, Finleyson, Wallace, Five Points and Pleasant View. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for central Georgia.
